category: Click Boards > Audio & voice > Signal processing
name: mikroe.click.headphoneamp3
short_description: Headphone AMP 3 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a stereo headphone amplifier. This board features the INA1620, a high-fidelity audio operational amplifier with integrated thin-film resistors and EMI filters from Texas Instruments. Over its dual amplifiers, it achieves a very low noise density and drives a 32Î© load at 150mW of output power.
